lines.text: You're a claustrophobic.
You want a fist in the mouth? I've never even looked at another guy before.

[watching a "Tortoise and the Hare" cartoon on TV]
Go! Move it, will ya? Aw, you're letting him blow right by ya! Can you believe this guy? Come on! Don't just...! Ninja-kick the damn rabbit! Do something!

a pet of my master Yoshi, mimicking his movements from my cage and learning the mysterious art of Ninjitsu, for Yoshi was one of Japan's finest shadow warriors. His only rival was a man named Oroko Saki, and they competed in all things, but in nothing more fiercely than for the love of a woman, Tang Shen. Shen's love was only for my master and rather than see him fight Saki for her hand, she persuaded Yoshi to flee with me to America. But Saki vowed vengeance. I remember it well, as my master returned home to find his beloved Shen lying on the floor, and then he saw her killer. Saki wasted no words, and during the struggle, my cage was broken. I leapt to Saki's face, biting and clawing, but he threw me to the floor and took one swipe with his Katana, slicing my ear. Then he was gone, and I was alone.
What became of this Oroku Saki?
Nobody really knows... But you wear his symbol.
[last lines]
We were awesome!
Bodacious!
Bitchin'!
Uh...
Gnarly!
Radical!
Totally tubular, dude!
Wicked!
Hellacious!
Uh, mega...
[Splinter clears his throat, the Turtles clam up]
I have always liked... Cowabunga.
COWABUNGA!

[laughs]
I made a funny!

[of Raph]
What the hell was that?
I - I don't know.

[jumps down next to them]
Now *that*, was a crime, you purse-grabbing pukes. And *this* is the penalty.
[knocks them over with his hockey stick]
Two minutes for slashing...
[does it again]
Two minutes for hooking...
[again]
two minutes for high sticking.

[jumps in and knocks him down]
How about a five-minute game misconduct for roughing, pal?
Hey, Bogey... who died and made you referee? You did your job, now get out of here and let me do mine, all right? These JV low lifes need to be taught a lesson.
Not like that they don't. Not from you.

[turns to see the thugs running away, turns back]
Well, it looks like you're the one who needs to be taught a lesson, pal.
[pulls out two ball bats]
The class is Pain 101. Your instructor is Casey Jones.
Look, I don't wanna fight you.
Yeah, well, tough rocks, pal.

For 15 years now, we have lived here. Before that time, I was a pet of my master Yoshi. When we were forced to come to New York, I found myself for the first time without a home, wandering thew sewers, scavaging for whatever I could find. And then, one day, I came upon a shattered glass jar and four baby turtles.

[interrupts]
That was us! Hee hee.
Shut up! Oh, no...
one of them spoke.

[in flashback]
Pizza. Pizza.
Leonardo, Michaelangelo
That's me.
Donatello.
[he makes a heroic-sounding hum]
and Raphael.
I'm not dreaming, am I?
No. I'm afraid not.
God, I LOVE *BEING A TURTLE*!
Oh man, I could go for a little deep dish action right about now.
I had some pizza here the other day. There might be some left over.
[Donatello takes a look]
Well?
Question!
Grrr, yeah?
Do you like penicillin on your pizza?
Doh!
[Donatello and Michelangelo start humming "Taps" and set the pizza aside]
All fathers care for their sons.

[Leonardo slices up pizza]
Yes, friends, the new tubo ginsu. Wa-hoo! It dices, it slices, and it makes French fries and three different...
[a pizza slice lands on Splinter's head]
WHOOPS.
Kids.

[after Raph hops on the cab hood]
What the heck was that?
Looked like sort of a big turtle, in a trench coat.
[pause]
You're going to La Guardia right?
I love you all, my sons.

[imitating Rocky Balboa]
Uh, yo well, uh, maybe I'll fight Apollo, uh, maybe I won't, you know. What do you think? Adrian.
[everyone laughs]
Okay, I got another one. Oh, this is totally cool.
Oh no, not Cagney.

[imitating James Cagney]
You dirty rat. You killed my brudda. You dirty rat. Oooh. Woo-hoo.
[everyone laughs]
That must be Splinter's favorite.
[the turtles glare at her]
It was a joke.
[they pause, then burst out laughing]
We were awesome.
Yes, Dudes and Dudettes, major-league butt-kicking is back in town.
Hasn't Raph been gone a long time?
Nah, he does it all the time. He likes it!
Are you sure?
Don't worry. He'll probably be back any minute now...
[an unconscious Raphael is thrown through the skylight, landing at Donatello's feet]

[searching for Michaelangelo's address]
OK, 122... 122 1/8? 122 1/8. Terrific. Where the heck is 122 1/8?

[through the sewer grate]
You're standing on it, Dude! Just pass it down here!
[the Delivery Man passes pizza through the grate, and $10 is passed up]
Gimme that!... Hey, this is a $10! The tab's $13!
You're two minutes late, dude!
Oh, come on, I couldn't find the place!
"Forgiveness is divine, but never pay full price for late pizza."

[walks away]
I gotta get a new route. And I thought I delivered everywhere...
Awesome!
Righteous!
Bossa Nova!
[Leonardo and Michaelangelo look at Donatello]
Dude, "Bossa Nova"?
Chevy Nova?
[Leonardo and Michaelangelo groan]
Excellent!
[Leonardo and Michaelangelo cheer in approval; Raphael walks sullenly behind them]
Death comes for us all, Oroku Saki, but something much worse comes for you. For when you die, it will be...
[Shredder throws a hidden knife; Splinter catches it, releasing the spear and letting Shredder fall from the building and land in the back of a garbage truck]
...Without honor.
Oops!
[Casey Jones pulls the lever of the garbage truck and activates its compactor]
Raphael, come sit by me.
Couldn't this wait 'til morning?

You will listen, now. My Master Yoshi's first rule was "Possess the right thinking. Only then can one receive the gifts of strength, knowledge, and peace." I have tried to channel your anger, Raphael, but more remains. Anger clouds the mind. Turned inward, it is an unconquerable enemy. You are unique among your brothers, for you choose to face this enemy alone. But as you face it, do not forget them, and do not forget me. I am here, my son.

[chasing Casey Jones]
Come back here! I'm not finished with you! DAMN!
Oh, Casey, hi.
Hi? I look like I just called Mike Tyson a sissy and all you can say is "Hi"?
You don't need an ambulance, do you?
No, but...
Just shut up and kiss me, OK? I got a report to do.
I love it when you're pushy.
Yeah?
[they kiss]

[to the Foot soldiers of Raph]
You guys mind telling me what you're doing to my little green pal over there, hm?
[sees April]
Oh, who is the babe?
Who the heck is that?
Wayne Gretzky on steroids?
Nice night.
Mm-hm. Pizza dude's got thirty seconds.
Mm-hm. Hey Mikey, did you ever think about what Splinter said tonight? I mean about what it would be like... You know, not having him?
Hmm... Time's up, three bucks off!

[sees that Raphael is awake and rushes to him]
Raph! You're awake! How do you feel?
What's a guy gotta do... to get some food around here?

[stands up, ecstatic, and runs to bathroom door]
Hey! Hey, he's awake! He wants some food! Bring some food!
[runs back to Raphael]
You're gonna be ok Raph... you're gonna be ok!
Yeah, yeah, alright Leo! Get a grip, will ya?
Listen, Raph...
[helps Raphael to his feet]
-about what I said before... y'know... about not needing you and all?
Leo... don't.
[they hug]
Boy, we missed you.

[he and April watch from the doorway]
It's a Kodak moment.
[first lines]

Much more than just a series of small, isolated incidents, it's now apparent that an organized criminal element is at work and at the moment, business is good. So good in fact that there appear to be no eyewitnesses to any of these crimes. With complaints ranging from purse snatching to breaking and entering, police switchboards have been swamped with the angry voices of more and more citizens who have fallen prey to the recent surge of crime that continues to plague the city. Instead of getting better, things are actually getting worse. Even more alarming is the baffling and often bizarre nature of these crimes. Merchandise of every size and description from skateboards to stereo systems has been disappearing from store shelves and storage areas at an alarming rate. Even the victims themselves rarely catch a glimpse of the thieves. Many don't even know they've been victimized until it's too late. In fact, police have yet to come up a single eyewitness. Only a few vague reports of young boys or teenagers at the scenes have been filed. But whoever is behind these crimes, one thing is certain, these are much than just a series of random isolated incidents. Crimes without criminals? An invisible gang at work? Who are we gonna call? Unfortunately the police are the only ones to combat what some are already dubbing the silent crime wave. But perhaps the most disturbing silence is that coming from city hall. April O'Neill, Channel 3 Eyewitness News.
Where's Splinter?
Ah, the rat. So it has a name...
[remembering his order to kill Splinter]
It HAD a name.

[furiously pushes past the other turtles]
You LIE!
Do I?

[Leo lunges at Shredder, who trips him up with his spear and pins him to the ground]
He dies! Weapons!
[the turtles grasp their weapons]
NOW!
[Mike, Don and Raph chuck their weapons over the side of the building]
Fools. Ha, ha. The three of you may have overpowered me with the loss of but one! Now your fate... will be HIS!
NOOOO!
We have had our first battle, Master Splinter! They were many, but we kicked... but we fought well.
Were you seen?
Uh-uh.

In this, you must never lapse. Even those who would be our allies, would not understand. Our domain is the shadow; stray from it reluctantly, for when you do, you must strike hard and fade away, without a trace.
I lost a sai!
Then, it is gone.
But I can get it back! I can get it back...
Raphael!... Let it go.
Lead the way, Toots.
"Toots"?
Babe? Sweetcakes? Ah - Princess! You wanna throw me a clue here? I'm drowning.
Hey, you know what, that's okay. I'll do it myself.
Fine, it's up to you. Just don't come around here asking for my help anymore.
Casey, I wouldn't ask for your help if you were the last THING on the face of this planet.
At least I know she thinks of me...
[Casey sprawls out on the porch swing; it breaks and he falls on it to the ground]

[Leonardo meditates heavily]
... Leonardo.
Huh? Splinter!

[inside playing a board game]
"What Russian novel, embraces more than 500 characters, is set in the Napoleotic wars?"
'War and Peace'.

[bursting in]
He's alive.

[Leo walks right on the board game]
Hey!
Game smash.
Splinter's alive.
We know, Leo, of course he is. We all think he's alive.
I don't *think*. I *know*.
Huh?
Okay, those guys in the black pajamas, they jumped me, and, and that rat... I saw *you* in the parking lot. That explains you. And you guys...
[the turtles]
Um... I have no idea where you came from.
If you will please just sit down and calm yourself, I will tell you where we came from.
It talks!
It is really quite simple, Miss O'Neil.
And he knows my name... perfect.
Fifteen years ago...
Why don't I ever dream of Harrison Ford?

[Raphael has brought an unconscious April O'Neil into the sewer]
Are you crazy?
Yeah, Leo, I'm crazy, OK? A loony, OK?
But why?
Why? Why, oh I don't know, 'cause I wanted to redecorate. You know, a couple of throw pillows, a TV news reporter, what do ya think?
[repeated line]
Damn.
[after Raphael gets a mention from April on the news]
I think he's blushing.
I am NOT.
I think he's actually turning red.
[Raphael chucks a Sai into the floor between Donatello's legs]
Hmm, maybe not.
[the Turtles' weapons are aimed at Danny as he exits the closet]
Don't shoot!

[his weapon is a Sai]
I don't think it's loaded, kid.
All right, I want some answers. Now what in God's name happened out here tonight? Somebody better talk to me.
Check out the East warehouse over on Lairdman Island. You'll get your answers there.
You guys must be studying the uh, abridged book of Ninja fighting.
[fights off the Foot Soldiers with ease]
I mean, come on, how do you guys expect to beat me?
[more and more Foot Soldiers arrive]
Good answer. Good answer!
the Shredder.
The Shredder?
Uuh... maybe all that hardware's for making coleslaw.

[sees that Raph has brought home an unconscious April]
Can we keep her?
[more Foot enter April's home]
Hey, guys, I'm not so sure this is, uh, structurally speaking, such a good time for your, uh, buddies to drop in...
[the floor gives away]
[April discovers a sai]

[watching]
Aw, man... damn!
[sneaks away]
[a member of the Foot pulls out a nunchuk]
Oh, a fellow chucker, eh?
[engages in a contest with the Foot Ninja, and wins]
Keep practicing!
Yes, Oroku Saki, I know who you are. We met many years ago in the home of my master, Hamato Yoshi!
[Shredder removes his mask to reveal his bite wounds]
It's him...
You... Now I will finish what I started with your EAR!
[charges at Splinter]
freaks of nature who interfere with our business. You are my eyes and ears. Find them! Together we will punish these creatures, these... turtles.
Good thing these guys aren't lumberjacks.
No joke. The only thing safe in the woods... would be the trees!

[about April's farmhouse]
Hey, didn't they use this place in The Grapes of Wrath?
Very funny. I told you, I haven't been up here in years.

This is great. First it was The Farm That Time Forgot and now this. Why don't I ever fall in with people who own condos? Probably hard to get good maid service in a sewer. Maybe you guys should try Roto Rooter, huh?

[of Shredder, who just showed up]
Can anyone tell me who or what this is?
Don't know, but I bet it never has to look for a can-opener.
A Jose Canseco bat? Tell me... you didn't pay money for this.
I'd like to invite you all in but I really don't have anything to offer you guys except for some... frozen pizza.

[springs up from the manhole like a jack-in-the-box]
Let's go for it!
You said the magic word.
You guys eat pizza?
Doesn't everybody?
Um, yeah... alright.

[from below]
Hey, did she say pizza?
[fighting Foot Soldiers]
Hey Donny, looks like this one is suffering from SHELL shock!
Too derivative.
Well, I guess we can really SHELL it out!
Too cliché.
Well, it was a SHELL of a good hit!
I like it!
Never lower your eyes to an enemy.
[fighting Foot Soldiers]
One of these guys must know where they're holding Splinter, so don't knock them all out.

[getting beat]
I don't think that will be a problem, Leo.

[Raph's hat has come off, revealing his face]
Hey, what are you, some sort of punker?
Huh?

[baiting]
God, I hate punkers... Especially bald ones with green make-up who wear... masks over ugly faces.
That's it.

[as Raph lunges]
Ooh.
New batter!
[Raph swings at Casey with the bat & missed]
Strike one!
[Raph swings again and misses]
What a wiffer!
[Raph jumps over Casey & hits him with the bat]
Home run! Raphael wins 1-nothing!
New game, round head.
[reaches behind and grabs a Cricket bat]
Cricket!
Cricket? Nobody understands cricket! You gotta know what a crumpet is to understand cricket!
I'll show ya!
[hits Raphael with the bat]
[Tatsu does his grunt as Casey immediately notices Tatsu, he tries to mimic his grunt in a playful way]
Uh, you know... A little um...
[acting like he is spraying something in his mouth]
Primatene might just help to clear that up there.
[Tatsu gave Casey a striaght punch towards his face, knocking him to the floor. As Casey gets up]
That's going to cost you, Tinkerbell.
[Tatsu gave Casey a left hook to Casey's face, knocking to the floor again. As Casey gets up]
You know, I don't think that you're listening.
[Tatsu kicks Casey, launching him to the air and crashing into the crates. Casey tries to get up after the injuries he sustained from Tatsu]
You know, I'm starting to pick up... on a little language barrier thing going here.

[Tatsu kicks Casey in the crotch, then a left roundhouse kick to his face, and then a left hook to his face, knocking him to floor with the injuries he sustained from Tatsu's attack. Casey, who is injured manages to reach for a golf club and as Tatsu approaches him, Casy struck Tatsu in the stomach with his golf club. As Tatsu aches in extreme pain]
Fore!
[Casey strikes Tatsu like a golf ball, sending him flying towards the wall with crates, knocking him out]

[kisses the golf club]
I'll never call golf a dull game again.
So what do we do now?
What do you mean, what do we do now?
Splinter's out there somewhere.
I know Splinter's out there.

[guessing what's about to happen]
Fight?
Fight.
Kitchen?
Kitchen.
Yeah.
[both Michaelangelo and Donatello leave]
So what are we gonna do about it?
What CAN we do about it? April's our only link to these guys. We have to wait until she comes up with something.
Oh, so that's the plan from the "great leader", huh? Just sit here on our butts!
I never said I was a great leader.
Well you sure act like it sometimes.
Yeah? Well, you act like a JERK sometimes, you know that? And this attitude of yours isn't helping anything.
Yeah? Well, maybe I'll just take my attitude and LEAVE!
Why don't you?
I will.
Good!
Great!
Go ahead! We don't need ya!

[listening from the kitchen]
Pork rind?
Pork rind.
Hey Donny, Wheel of Fortune, Dude.
[spins around on his shell, knocking down several Foot Soldiers]
Hmm, I guess they're not game show fans.
And I thought everybody loved Vanna.
My nearest neighbors are about four miles away. I need to get to a phone and call my boss.
You mean Charles?
Yes; how did you know that?
He left a message on your machine, uh, just before we got out...
And?
Well, hey, you just saved yourself an eight-mile round-tripper. Um... You were fired.
I just saved myself?

[oblivious to the dark tone]
Mm-hm.
Uh-oh.
What did you do? Did you take classes in insensitivity?
I was just trying to break it to you easy.
Oh, well you FAILED miserably...
Hey, broadzilla, you wouldn't even be standin' here if it weren't for me, okay?
Oh, well what do you want? You want a thank you?
...No. It's me who should thank you for that priviledge, right?
Fine!
Yeah.
Thank you.
No, thank YOU!
You're welcome!
YOU'RE welcome!
[they go into two separate rooms and slam the doors]
Gosh, it's kinda like Moonlighting, isn't it?
[Michaelangelo nods]
You're fired, April. I'm sorry... I know this comes as a blow.
[the wire burns off and the machine falls, hitting a Foot Soldier over the head]
You can say that again, Chuck.
We have a loyalty to the Shredder.
The Shredder uses you. He poisons your minds to obtains for that which he desires. He cares nothing for you or the people you hurt.
We're family.
Family? Did you say family? You call this here and that...
[points to Tatsu, who he just knocked out]
...down there, family?
Go... play.
Ninja... vanish!
O'Neil... get in here!

[to the technician on her way in]
Time me.
Just what is it you hope to accomplish out there, besides BUSTING MY CHOPS?
I think you know just as much as I do about this Foot Clan and I don't think you're doing anything about it.
You expect me to waste precious manpower because some immigrants are reminded of something that supposedly happened, years ago in Japan!
Have you got anything else?
Are you tryin' to tell me HOW TO DO MY JOB?
07. A new record.
Who are you?
Casey Jones, a friend.
Will I ever see you guys again?
Indubitably!
Well, that depends on how fast you restock your pizza.
It's time for us to go back!
[hurling insults in alphabetical order]
Not even close, Zip Neck. Professor and Mary Anne. Happily ever after.
No way, Atomic Mouth, Gilligan was her main man. They'd be married and have six kids by now.
Gilligan was a geek, Barfaroni!
You're the geek, Camel Breath!
Dome head.
Elf lips!
[Casey finishes fixing the engine]
Okay let's give this a try, funkoid!
Here it goes... What are we on?
Uh, G.
Here it goes, gak face!
I'm ready, hose brain!
Your empire flourishes, Master Shredder.
What more from the rat?
Nothing. He will not speak.
And the boy who lead us to the turtles?
He is still missing. I do not understand. Why do the turtles trouble you, Master? They have not been seen for many days.
Something about the way you describe their fighting. Something familiar. Something... from the past.
[Foot Soldiers broke in through windows]
Boy, and I thought insurance salesmen were pushy!
What are we just standing here for? Let's get him!

[brandishing golf club]
Do you wanna be first, Junior?
There will be no mistakes this time... I go myself. And the rat - kill it.
Yes, Master.

[Danny puts on his stolen headphones]
See? That's what he does when he wants to ignore me; he sticks his head in those things. I wonder where the hell he GOT those things, anyway.
[Michaelangelo jumps out of nowhere, startling April]
That was close. Whoa, time to switch to decaf, April.
We have been waiting for you, Miss O'Neil.
Am I behind on my Sony payments again? Ha ha ha.
Your mouth may yet bring you much trouble, Miss O'Neil. I deliver a message.
[Slaps her hard on the cheek]
Shut it!

[trying to change the subject from Charles giving her security]
Hey, Danny, how's school going?
Fine.
Oh, wonderful. So wonderful, in fact, that I have to drive him there every morning now just to make sure he goes.
[Raphael has just seen the movie Critters]
Ugh. Where do they come up with this stuff?
So, what do you guys like on your pizza?
flies, stink bugs... It was a joke.

[of Raphael]
Well... I *was* going to give you guys a tour of the store. Shall we go get him?
No.
Uh... he just needs to blow off some steam.
Yeah.
We are presently executing a plan of redeployment that will minimize response time while maximizing coordination between patrol units and a decentralized networking scheme.
I'm not sure I understood all of that, Chief Sterns. Would you mind repeating it, in English, perhaps?
Got any cigarettes?

[pulls out two cartons]
Regular or menthol?

[sighs after knocking out two Foot Soldiers in rapid succession]
It's a talent.
I do hope there's more o' them.
[after easilly defeating dozens of foot soldiers, the turtles are suddenly getting decimated by their leader, Shredder]

[Out of breath]
Okay... At what point... did we lose... control, here?
Are you guys sure you know where you're going?
11th and Bleeker?
[Sniffs the air]
Nope, this is only 9th St. Ha ha! Get it?
Yeah.
Okay!
And then there's Casey Jones, a nine-year-old trapped in a man's body. He might be cute except for that pigheadedness...

[on the phone ordering a pizza]
Oh, and I want no anchovies. And I mean, NO anchovies. You put anchovies on this thing and you're in big trouble, okay?
